body_html:
Great work, @tmc ! Hope that will be merged soon.

It would be great if someone, who successfully used TF with Go add a tiny how-to text about start using it (in tensorflow/go/README.md just description what it is, and test just verify bindings as I see). I am not as good with Python as with Go, but would like to start experimenting (and if I can, contribute some more docs).

Thnx in advance!
